posts.post_content:
More cards from a collection I'm selling that has been tucked away for the past three decades or so. All were raw before being sent to SGC last month.

Prices are delivered within the United States. PayPal is fine; no need to "gift" your payment.

A commitment to buy takes precedence over an ongoing negotiation. :rolleyes:  

[URL="wolfie51sb@aol.com"]Feel free to email any questions.[/URL] Larger scan(s) of any card(s) available, just ask.

Thanks,

Rob

[URL="wolfie51sb@aol.com"]wolfie51sb at aol.com [/URL]

T206 Baker (HOF), Piedmont 350, 10/1: SOLD

T206 Ball (Cleveland), Sweet Caporal 350-460, A: SOLD

T206 Berger, Piedmont 350, 35/2.5: SOLD

T206 Evers (HOF), Chicago on shirt, Piedmont 350-460, 35/2.5: SOLD

T206 Flick (HOF), Piedmont 150, 30/2: SOLD

T206 Hinchman, Piedmont 150, 30/2: SOLD

T206 Joss (HOF), pitching, Sweet Caporal 350, 40/3: SOLD

T206 Lajoie (HOF), portrait, Piedmont 150, 30/2: SOLD

T206 Liebhardt, Piedmont 150, 30/2: SOLD

T206 Mathewson (HOF), white cap, Piedmont 150, A, SOLD

T206 Myers, fielding, Sweet Caporal 350, A: SOLD

T206 Perring, Piedmont 350, 20/1.5: SOLD

I will take baker and mathewson if they are still available

[quote name="stewbacca" post=1114579]I will take baker and mathewson if they are still available[/QUOTE]

good deals on these 2!  you need a fast trigger finger with this seller.  don't know who he is but his selling rate is prolific.

[quote name="chaddurbin" post=1114590]good deals on these 2!  you need a fast trigger finger with this seller.  don't know who he is but his selling rate is prolific.[/QUOTE]

I'd rather sell them than bump them.

I think the secret of his success is that he doesn't waste time posting them in the new pick up thread first - straight to the BST.

Fair pricing and free gift wrap doesn't hurt either!

I have been saving for one of the bigs(cobb, matty, cy and johnson) in low grade. I even make an offer on the red cobb with 2 holes punched in it on ebay, but wasnt accepted.  I know things move fast on some of these here on Net54 and I just sat down at the computer at the right time.  I thought someones PM would have beat me on the matty.

PM sent on Liebhardt, Berger, and Lajoie.

Lee

[quote name="tinkertoeverstochance" post=1114637]PM sent on Liebhardt, Berger, and Lajoie.

Lee[/QUOTE]

They're yours. Thanks.

Update to reflect all sold. All purchases will be in the mail Wednesday morning. 

Thanks, Rob
